statements: SELECT * FROM SocialMediaCampaignPerformance;
SELECT campaign_name, impression_count FROM SocialMediaCampaignPerformance WHERE start_date = '2022-05-01';
SELECT campaign_name, click_count, conversion_rate FROM SocialMediaCampaignPerformance WHERE end_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT campaign_id, impression_count, conversion_rate FROM SocialMediaCampaignPerformance ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaCampaignPerformance WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-07-31';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM SocialMediaCampaignPerformance WHERE impression_count > 1000 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC
SELECT campaign_name, click_count FROM SocialMediaCampaignPerformance WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND end_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY click_count DESC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, impression_count FROM SocialMediaCampaignPerformance WHERE click_count > 500 AND conversion_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY impression_count ASC, start_date DESC
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaCampaignPerformance WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND click_count BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY impression_count DESC, click_count DESC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, conversion_rate FROM SocialMediaCampaignPerformance WHERE impression_count < 10000 AND click_count > 100 ORDER BY click_count ASC
SELECT * FROM social_media_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date FROM social_media_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM social_media_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, clicks, impressions FROM campaign_analytics WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT campaign_name, conversions FROM social_media_campaigns JOIN campaign_analytics ON social_media_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_analytics.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM social_media_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM social_media_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'

SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, clicks, impressions, conversions FROM social_media_campaigns JOIN campaign_analytics ON social_media_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_analytics.campaign_id

SELECT campaign_name, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions FROM social_media_campaigns JOIN campaign_analytics ON social_media_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_analytics.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, CASE WHEN end_date >= '2022-06-30' THEN 'Active' ELSE 'Completed' END AS status FROM social_media_campaigns
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, budget, start_date FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, ad_type, ad_cost FROM Ads ORDER BY ad_cost DESC;
SELECT date, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM Analytics WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, ad_cost, ad_clicks FROM Ads ORDER BY ad_cost DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, ad_cost FROM Ads WHERE ad_clicks > 100 ORDER BY ad_cost DESC;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, ad_cost, ad_clicks FROM Ads WHERE ad_type = 'Banner' AND ad_clicks > 50 ORDER BY ad_clicks DESC, ad_cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT ad_name, ad_type FROM Ads WHERE ad_cost > 1000 ORDER BY ad_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM Impressions INNER JOIN Ads ON Impressions.ad_id = Ads.ad_id WHERE ad_type = 'Banner';
SELECT impression_date, user_id FROM Impressions INNER JOIN Clicks ON Impressions.user_id = Clicks.user_id WHERE Clicks.click_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, ad_cost, ad_clicks FROM Ads WHERE ad_type = 'Banner' ORDER BY ad_cost DESC;
SELECT ad_name, click_date FROM Ads INNER JOIN Clicks ON Ads.ad_id = Clicks.ad_id WHERE Clicks.click_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-01';

SELECT Campaigns.campaign_name, Impressions.impression_date FROM Campaigns INNER JOIN Ads ON Campaigns.campaign_id = Ads.campaign_id INNER JOIN Impressions ON Ads.ad_id = Impressions.ad_id WHERE Impressions.user_id = 12345 ORDER BY Impressions.impression_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_budget FROM social_media_campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM social_media_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1
SELECT * FROM social_media_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_budget FROM social_media_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_budget DESC
SELECT * FROM social_media_campaigns WHERE campaign_budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, SUM(campaign_budget) AS total_budget FROM social_media_campaigns GROUP BY campaign_name;
SELECT campaign_name, DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date) AS campaign_duration FROM social_media_campaigns;
SELECT AVG(campaign_budget) AS avg_budget FROM social_media_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, MONTH(start_date) AS start_month, YEAR(start_date) AS start_year FROM social_media_campaigns ORDER BY start_year, start_month DESC;
